_source.text: A better-than-expected gain in US consumer confidence, climbing to the highest level in eight months in December, bolstered optimism about the American economic recovery.

text: A **better**-**than**-expected **gain** in US consumer confidence, climbing to the highest level in eight
months in December, bolstered optimism about the American economic **recovery**.

_source.text: 1- the economic gain for the state from a good legalization law (same but better than the law on alcohol)

text: 1- the economic **gain** for the state from a good **legalization** law (same but **better** **than** the law on alcohol)
